original_title: Wildcatter: The Story of Texas Oil
overview: Tells the story of the wildcatters of the Great East Texas Oil Field, providing a rollicking account of the risky business of those who drilled oil wells in areas not thought to be oil fields in 1930s East Texas, as well as the Wild West gyrations it put the oil industry, the economy and both State And Federal Government through.
title: Wildcatter: The Story of Texas Oil
